message: I propose a 90/10 split.  It's fair and leaves plenty for us both.
You rejected my fair offer, now I'll take the majority. Don't expect a better deal next time.
Let's be reasonable. We both stand to lose more the longer we play.  A 50/50 split is the fairest way to go at this point.
You want 50/50? I'll give you 60/40, but that's as high as it goes.
